pkgmetadata.longdescription: Robust Singular Value Decomposition using Density Power Divergence // Computing singular value decomposition with robustness is a challenging task. This package provides an implementation of computing robust SVD using density power divergence (doi:10.48550/arXiv.2109.10680). It combines the idea of robustness and efficiency in estimation based on a tuning parameter. It also provides utility functions to simulate various scenarios to compare performances of different algorithms.
